channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Artificial light has essentially lengthened birds' day
item.description: Millions of audio recordings of hundreds of bird species have revealed that artificial light is making the birds wake up earlier and go to bed later.

item.title: Texas and California near new partisan voting maps in a battle prompted by Trump
item.description: California and Texas, the country's two most populous states, are getting closer to redrawing their congressional districts in a political fight spark...

item.title: Hamas has one top strategy: End the war and survive
item.description: Hamas has endorsed a new proposal for a ceasefire deal with Israel in Gaza, as it faces pressure from Arab countries and seeks to ensure its own survi...

item.title: Trump says he's going on patrol in DC with the National Guard
item.description: President Trump says he wants to see for himself how National Guard soldiers and police officers are cracking down on what he has described as rampant...

item.title: With Fed under pressure, Jerome Powell prepares for a high-stakes speech
item.description: The Fed chair will speak Friday at an annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyo. The speech comes as the central bank is under mounting pressure ...

item.title: California to take on Newsom-backed redistricting plan today

item.title: Trump to join Washington patrol while feds deploy checkpoints around city
What Trump’s crime crackdown in DC looks like in photos
item.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Pedestrians walk their dogs past parked military vehicles. Commuters move past National Guards at metro stations.

item.title: Israel will begin talks to free all hostages, Netanyahu says
item.description: Earlier this week, a Hamas source said the armed group had agreed to a temporary ceasefire proposal from mediators.

item.title: Unsealed video shows TikTok employees' concerns about its impact on teens
item.description: A newly unsealed video shows current and former TikTok employees raising concerns about how the app's popular algorithm could impact young people. Dig...

item.title: 6 found dead during confined space rescue at Northern Colorado dairy farm
item.description: Six people were found dead Wednesday evening at a dairy farm in Northern Colorado, officials said.

item.title: UK backs call for Israel to allow foreign media into Gaza
item.description: Governments from 27 countries, including France and Germany, say journalists in Gaza must be protected.

item.title: Appeals court throws out Trump's $500m civil fraud penalty
item.description: In its 323-page ruling, the New York judges stated that the fine was excessive, and likely violated the US Constitution.

item.title: Alina Habba serving unlawfully as N.J.'s top federal prosecutor, judge rules

item.title: Hurricane Erin starts moving away from North Carolina coastline

item.title: Privacy and civil rights groups urge US colleges to end campus surveillance to protect protesters
If a Putin-Zelensky summit takes place, where could it be?
item.description: Geneva, Istanbul and Budapest have been put forward as potential locations - but bilateral talks still remain a long way off.

item.title: French streamer's death 'not due to trauma', autopsy finds
item.description: The online personality known as Jean Pormanove was found dead in his home in Nice on Monday.
